Review: Takes around 15 minutes to cool the room when the outside temperature is ~35 degree celcius. Not that silent operation. But you will get used to it. Consumed around 8 units of electricity for 12 hour continuous operation with 5 star rated unit. Installation was quick and was done in a day after the product was delivered.The executives who came for installation were not authorised samsung service executives. However they did the job well. Overall a good buy, 100% value for money. A trusted brand.READ MORE
